title: 142. Forecast For Returning Restaurant Guests Through Q1
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Elizabeth Blau, the founder and chief executive officer of Blau & Associates. Barron and Blau forecast the first quarter of 2021 and explore when customers will return to restaurants.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
